title: Resistant
description: I am the favored prisoner, a traitor to my cause, working to find a way out of the camp and deliver my research to the Resistance.She is my reward, naked, blindfolded, and broken. And we aren't permitted to speak.She is mine .I knew it the first night in the stocks when my arms closed around her and her trembling eased. And the second night when she willingly gave me pleasure and smiled. She lit up the stocks with heaven's light. And I will do whatever it takes to save my Angel from the camp, her captor, and find her abducted children. I will never let her go.Resistant is the first book in an interconnected dystopian dark romance series.
author: Ayn Kenyon
